name: SimOrbit
description:
This project aims to create a space physics simulation running in your browser. More likely it will just cause some lags, but that's the best part of an alpha project, isn't it?

Controls
  • You can take off that red particle using [spacebar]. 
  • Use the arrows to apply impulses and alter the particle trajectory.  
  • The slider on the top will change the strength of the impulse
  • [W][A][S][D] keys will pan the camera, while the [mousewheel] will change the zoom. 

If there were a moon at all, I would write you a tutorial how to get there. Really, I would. But I'd better write the code for the moon now.
